full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL KUN GYI YUM GCIG DBANG LDAN SRING GSUM DBANG MO DBU 'PHANG BSTOD CING MNGA' GSOL BA'I BDEN TSIG DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA 'JO BA'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES RGYAL BA KUN GYI YUM GCIG DPAL DLAN SRID GSUM DBANG MO DBU 'PHANG BSTOD CING MNGA' GSOL BA'I BDEN TSIG DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA 'JO BA'I BUM BZANG 'DI NI GSANG BA MCHOG GI RNAL 'BYOR PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'BRUG DBYUG PA ZLA BA'I DKAR PHYOGS BZANG PO GSUM PA'I NYI MA ME BZHI'I 'GRUB SBYOR THOGS SU BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O,, ,,)
